info.name: Nawartu API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Nawartu - A property rental platform

body.raw:
{
  "bookingId": "{{bookingId}}",
  "rating": {
    "overall": 5,
    "cleanliness": 5,
    "communication": 4,
    "checkIn": 5,
    "accuracy": 5,
    "location": 5,
    "value": 4
  },
  "comment": "Fantastic stay! The property exceeded expectations.",
  "privateComment": "Minor issue with the Wi-Fi but overall great."
}

query.description: Filter by role: user, host, admin
